name: Heart Attack Hero
description: Heart Attack Hero is a computer based two-dimensional pixel platformer game in which the user plays as a chubby man combating healthy foods and other enemies in order to collect the sacred nine-piece chicken nugget meal. Extra modes include Run 'n Gun, Two Player Sumo (with multiple maps), and a boss fight with a character who looks oddly similar to Andrew Tate.  Supports PS4, Nintendo, and Xbox controllers. For Windows, download the .pck file with the .exe to run. Game was made with Godot game engine so it is safe and reliable.
